person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Officials said the New Mexico Activities Association decided to bar Cito from any inter-scholastic competition until next October , regardless of the school he attends .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
|--------|
| Officials |
| Cito |

The paragraph mentions two entities: "Officials" and "Cito". "Officials" refers to the individuals who made the decision, and "Cito" is the person who is barred from inter-scholastic competition until next October.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| Officials |
| Cito |

The paragraph mentions only two entities that clearly refer to persons: "Officials" and "Cito".
